author: Pete Wedderburn
title: Pet subjects: Why is my guinea pig snoring?
text: Pets Pet subjects: Why is my guinea pig snoring? Our resident vet Pete Wedderburn answers your pet problems. This week: the best way to bathe a cat, and a noisy guinea pig Guinea pigs are prone to allergies, which could cause upper airways to swell and narrow Photo: GETTY IMAGES
